item.description: LFI/PHP Wrappers Log Poisoning Abusing Python Binary Python Library Hijacking Escaneo de puertos ❯ nmap -p- -T5 -v -n 192.168.1.15 PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http Escaneo de Servicios ❯ nmap -sVC -v -p 22,80 192.168.1.15 -oN servicios PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 7.9p1 Debian 10+deb10u2 (protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 2048 3681c13bb87b840f6a417b2e3a014c44 (RSA) | 256 f67e44418000b0c2e9038d74c37aea0e (ECDSA) |_ 256 37d15ab4e50a779a2a7e1a637cd42e9b (ED25519) 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.

item.title: VulNyx - Hat
item.description: FTP Brute Force Passphrase Cracking LFI IPv6 Abusing nmap binary Escaneo de puertos ❯ nmap -p- -T5 -v -n 192.168.1.24 PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp filtered ssh 80/tcp open http 65535/tcp open unknown Escaneo de servicios ❯ nmap -sVC -v -p 22,80,65535 192.168.1.24 PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp filtered ssh 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.4.38 ((Debian)) |_http-server-header: Apache/2.4.38 (Debian) | http-methods: |_ Supported Methods: GET POST OPTIONS HEAD |_http-title: Apache2 Debian Default Page: It works 65535/tcp open ftp pyftpdlib 1.
